instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1369: What is A1369? A1369 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2010, Mid 2011 with EMC 2392, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2838, 820-3023..
definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
threads.message:
This machine had liquid spill. It chimes but no apple logo.
Screen quickly illuminates but is divided in 2 horizontally with lots of fine coloured lines across the entire area.
I've tried connecting an external screen (monitor), but there is nothing being displayed on it.
There is noticeable corrosion around <CHIP>U7701</CHIP> and <RESISTOR>R7715</RESISTOR> area

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
threads.message:
Sounds like bad screen for me.
Test another known good LCD assembly.
External video may not appear before login to OSX, so give it time.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
threads.message: Will a screen from a 2011 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1369</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> work for testing, or are they different to the <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  coloured vertical lines on screen
threads.message:
Great. I've tried that screen from the <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1369</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> and it works!
Now to find a replacement for the original.
Thanks for your help guys :)
